citeinfo.title: Plant community composition and vegetation height, Barrow, Alaska, Ver. 1

descript.abstract: This dataset contains i) the results of field surveys of plant community composition and vegetation height made between 17th and 29th July 2012 in 48, 1 x 1 m plots located in areas A-D of Intensive Site 1 at the Next-Generation Ecosystem Experiments (NGEE) Arctic site near Barrow, Alaska and ii) results of a mapping exercise undertaken in August 2013 using two perpendicular transects across each polygon containing vegetation plots to determine the boundaries of vegetation communities described in 2012. doi:10.5440/1129476; http://dx.doi.org/10.5440/1129476.
descript.purpose: Data were collected to i) characterise the NGEE site ii) to explore links between plant community composition and micro-topography and ii) to inform scaling of the landscape from plot to model grid cell.
